alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 1:14PM PDT until March 23 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, mostly above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow level will mostly fluctuate between 4500 and 5000 feet with much of the accumulating snow above 5000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
